attributes.action: Stop my children crying by ending Teresa's discriminatory 18600 pound visa rules
attributes.additional_details:
My wife has paid taxes in the UK.
My wife does not and has never claimed benefits.
My wife has been married for 14 years and now cannot see our two children like any other married couple.
This is a shame to this nation.
attributes.background: As someone married to foreign partner I have the humanright to bring my wife to live in the same country without an income requirement. This is the Britishapartheid and it is a shame that Teresa May does not recognize even the sanctity of marriage.
